tradestatistics v1.0

  • Changelog

A table of sections codes, names and colours associated to products

ots_sections.Rd

Provides section names from the Harmonized System.

ots_sections

Format

A data frame with 1222 observations on the following 2 variables.

product_code

Product code (e.g. 0101)

section_code

Section code (e.g. 01)

Examples

ots_sections
#>       product_code section_code
#>    1:         0101           01
#>    2:         0102           01
#>    3:         0103           01
#>    4:         0104           01
#>    5:         0105           01
#>   ---                          
#> 1218:         9703           21
#> 1219:         9704           21
#> 1220:         9705           21
#> 1221:         9706           21
#> 1222:         9999           22
